'''Radiant Spincrystal 108''' is an item used in any [[Furnishing]] of the [[Euphonium Unbound]] series to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] ''[[Truncated Verse]]'' in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located on top of some crates underneath the [[Statue of The Seven]] of the [[Liffey Region]].
